name: 2D Platformer (hemanthy)
description:
Future Modifications:

1. The default UI of the game reminded me of Buzz Lightyear( given there is a new movie about him releasing soon), so I will change the UI of the whole game to be Buzz Lightyear themed with enemies that Lightyear would face.

2. I will change the whole player sprite to look like Buzz Lightyear and change the sound to seem like Buzz Lightyear music.

3. I will create multiple levels leading up to a big boss at the end(spoiler alert: it's Zurg).

P.S. The WebGL version could not be uploaded because of some errors that kept occurring but I was able to play the Mac version on my laptop and inherently Windows should be working as well. I will attend office hours this week to fix this issue.
